EmailTemplate.name: RE: MBO Partners How We Help widget (1342023038.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: RE: MBO Partners How We Help widget (1342023038.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Lindsay, You are so welcome. I asked around and unfortunately we do not have any partnerships in Canada that I could refer. However, if you use those key phrases I am sure you will find some organizations similar to ours. If you ever have a project in the US please contact us! Best,Sara From: Lindsay Miles [mailto:lindsaymiles@rogers.com] Sent: Tuesday, July 10, 2012 7:43 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: RE: MBO Partners How We Help widget Thanks Sara, I will follow your advice and look forward to any referral(s) you might have. Thanks again. Lindsay Lindsay Miles613 261 9740 cell613 254 9418 home/office From: Sara Conde [mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com] <mailto:[mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com]> Sent: July-10-12 3:47 PM To: lindsaymiles@rogers.com <mailto:lindsaymiles@rogers.com> Subject: RE: MBO Partners How We Help widget Hi Lindsay, Thank you for the inquiry you submitted at the MBO Partners website. I wanted to introduce myself as the person at MBO Partners responsible for all new associate and partnership requests. I’ll be your main point of contact to provide you an overview of our services and answer any specific questions you may have. We can work with Candaian citizens who are coming to the US to work via a TN visa but unfortuenitly we do not operate in Candia as we are not se up for Candian tax witholidng. If you Google key words like, “employer of record, canada”, “umbrealla company, Canada” I am sure you will find a services similar to ours. I will ask around and see if I can get you a refferal. Take care, Sara ___________________________________SARA CONDEConsultant Services Advisor MBO Partners t: 703.793.6028f: 703.793.6068e: sconde@mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd1hXsVR38vGQLqz%2BvyfPfZ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D>w: www.mbopartners.com <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&http://www.mbopartners.com/?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd1hXsVR38vGQLqz%2BvyfPfZ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. From: Lindsay Miles [mailto:lindsaymiles@rogers.com] <http://mkto-l0128.com/track?t=c&&&&mailto:%5bmailto:lindsaymiles@rogers.com%5d?mkt_tok=2xUAKZjCd1hXsVR38vGQLqz%2BvyfPfZ26qPJ%2BBvqMuKVUsyIUGIalUg%3D%3D> Sent: Monday, July 09, 2012 4:16 PM To: feedback Subject: MBO Partners How We Help widget Does your company deal with or through anyone in Canada?
